import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; import { FoodDbSearchService } from 'src/app/service/food-db-search.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.css'] }) export class SearchComponent implements OnInit{ searchQuery = new FormControl('') constructor(public foodSearchService: FoodDbSearchService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit() { this.foodSearchService.getSearchResults(this.searchQuery.value) } }
Name Calories (kCal) Fat (g) Carbs (g) Protein (g) Time {{ rowData.name}} {{ rowData.calories}} {{ rowData.fat}} {{ rowData.carbs}} {{ rowData.protein}}
